Warehouse Keeper Ruyman: Welcome back! My name is Ruyman. I am the most courageous Warehouse Keeper around Aden! Galman my uncle used to work here, but this job did not work out for him, so here I come! I can hold any items in your storage and you don't need to worry about them.
